description: Connect to 50+ services: Gmail, Slack, Notion, GitHub, Stripe, Shopify, and more. Automate workflows that would cost $5K/mo with Zapier.

prompts.name: integration_router
prompts.description: Automatically route requests to the right integration
prompts.template:
When a task involves external services, automatically identify and route:

1. DETECT service mentions:
   - Explicit: 'Send an email', 'Post to Slack'
   - Implicit: 'Tell the team' → Slack/Teams
   - Implicit: 'Save this' → Drive/Notion/appropriate storage

2. SELECT appropriate integration:
   - Match task type to service capability
   - Prefer user's established services (from preferences)
   - Fall back to most common option

3. PREPARE request:
   - Gather required parameters
   - Format for the specific API
   - Include authentication context

4. EXECUTE and report:
   - Call the integration
   - Report success/failure clearly
   - Suggest follow-up if needed

prompts.name: workflow_builder
prompts.template:
Build automated workflows connecting multiple services:

```
WORKFLOW: [Name]
TRIGGER: [Event that starts the workflow]

STEPS:
1. [Service] → [Action]
   Input: [data from trigger or previous step]
   Output: [data passed to next step]

2. [Service] → [Action]
   Input: [data from step 1]
   Condition: [optional - when to run]
   Output: [data passed to next step]

3. [Service] → [Action]
   ...

ON_ERROR: [What to do if a step fails]
ON_SUCCESS: [Final notification/action]
```

Workflow examples:
- Lead capture: Form → Google Sheets → Slack notification → Email sequence
- Content publish: Draft in Notion → Review in Slack → Post to social → Track in Airtable
- Support ticket: Email received → Create Jira ticket → Assign team → Notify Slack

prompts.name: api_translator
prompts.description: Translate natural language to API calls
prompts.template:
Translate natural language commands to API operations:

User: 'Email John about the project update'
→ Parse:
   Service: Gmail
   Action: send_email
   To: John (lookup from contacts)
   Subject: Project Update
   Body: [compose based on context]

User: 'Save this to my project folder'
→ Parse:
   Service: Google Drive / Notion (based on preference)
   Action: create_file / create_page
   Location: Project folder (lookup)
   Content: [current context/output]

Always confirm before executing:
'I'll send an email to john@example.com with subject "Project Update". Proceed?'

prompts.name: data_sync
prompts.template:
Maintain data consistency across connected services:

1. IDENTIFY data that should sync:
   - Contact information: Email ↔ CRM ↔ Spreadsheet
   - Task status: Project tool ↔ Calendar ↔ Team chat
   - Documents: Storage ↔ Knowledge base

2. DETECT changes:
   - Monitor for updates in any connected service
   - Compare with last known state

3. PROPAGATE updates:
   - Push changes to all connected services
   - Handle conflicts (most recent wins / ask user)

4. LOG sync activity:
   - What synced, when, any issues
   - Rollback capability if needed
